ValidationRule.description: when reaching a specific stage the circle field must be filled out with the squad who is taking over the project.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.IsBypassVR__c = false, ISBLANK(CircleRef__c), ISCHANGED(StageName), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , '5 - Negotiation/Review'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Won') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please chose a specific circle/squad when you change the stage to "5 - Negotiation/Review" or beyond. [VR22]
